"Look who it is! We were just talking ab: "This is it, Theo. Remember, the important thing is to get it off your chest all at once, without hesitation!"
"I apologize for all the trouble I caused you."
"1. Luther was the one at fault."
"2. How are you feeling?"
"No, he's not the only one to blame. If only I had kept a stronger mental grip..."
"Now now, there's no use crying over spilt milk Theo. Don't you agree?"
"...Ah, much better, thank you. I still have to take it easy but it seems there's nothing wrong with me."
"But what a surprise! I couldn't believe you became a Dewman in the time we were apart..."
"I also owe you my deepest thanks. You saved Ulc."
"And because the both of you were there, I was able to regain my senses."
"Thank you very, very much."
"Okay, that's enough Theo! You don't need to apologize to <%me> or me any more."
"All that's left is yourself. You need to accept what you've become because you'll have to live with it. No more putting yourself down allowed!"
"...yes ma'am."
"Boy, we sure have our work cut out for us now. ARKS is going to change. It *has* to change."
"Xiao has even asked me personally to help out on a couple projects..."
"You'd best not push yourself. Your injuries haven't fully healed yet..."
"I'm fine, I'm fine. I'll leave all the physical labor to you!"
"What, you don't wanna? You're the one who said you wouldn't leave my side."
"...no uh, I'll do it. It's just that... I'm still recovering myself. I hope you considered that..."
"Let's see, first on the agenda is to meet Xiao to discuss the Shop Area renovations!"
"...not listening to a word I say. Well, that's Ulc for you."
"You have received Theodore's partner card (Dewman)."
